name: Solitude (PixelJerry)
description:
Max has left the hustle and bustle of everyday life!

He found a cosy planet he has decided to call home, but could not bring everything he needed with on his shuttle.

Luckily Max is a great builder, and has decided to gather and craft what he needs to enjoy his blissful solitary existence!

Game created using Game Maker Studio 2 for Ludum Dare 38.
